content: _______________________________________________________________________________ _______________________________________________                       ★ Websit  ★ Telegram  ★ Telegram  ★ Twitter  ★ Facebook ★ Instagram  ★ Youtube  ★ Discord   ★ Reddit   ★_______________________________________________________________________________ _______________________________________________GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS:* If a participant is found to be used ill-practice for any campaign. A participant will be disqualified.* Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.* If rules set out in these campaigns are not followed, the participants will not be rewarded accordingly and no negotiation will be entertained.* Disqualified members will lose the entire coins earned and this is irrevocable.* The disqualified member will not be informed. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.* The coins will be distributed at the end of the bounty program.* Submission of work must be provided via the submission form. It is mandatory and theonly way for the work results in acceptance. Only submitted work in the submission form will be counted for stakes.* All tasks invole joining/following the ASD profile on that platform (where appropriate) will all additionally tasked with joining the ASD Telegram.* You can keep your work post in this thread (optional) to ensure the bounty claims later along with all other details asked in the submission form (as proof of stakes).* Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.* We will update the stakes [weekly].* You are not allowed to ask about the bounty campaign in the main chat of the project.                                            Twitter          30%                                          Telegram      20%                                            Video           15%                                           Article           15%                             Telegram: First 300 approved participants.                               Discord: First 250 approved participants.                               Reddit: First 250 approved participants.                               Video: First 50 approved participants.                               Article: Top 50 articles will be selected.                                   Week 1 (27.01-02.02)                                   Week 2 (03.02-09.02)                                   Week 3 (10.02-16.02)                                  Week 4 (17.02-23.02)                                                                                     Join ahmim Bounty Management Telegram 5 Valid Tweets/Retweets 5 Stakes10  Valid Tweets/Retweets 10 Stakes15 Valid Tweets/Retweets 15 Stakes20 Valid Tweets/Retweets 20 StakesRules:  ★ Every participant must follow Twitter ★ Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.★ Maximum 4 retweet per day count.★ Participants must use #EPNOC #ICO #PRESALE #BITCOIN #ETH #NFT #INVESTING #1000XGEM #CRPTOEXCHANGE #WEB3 #CRYPTONEWS #BLOCKCHAIN #HYBRID #GIVEAWAY hashtags in every retweet or tweet.★ Fill the registration form : https://forms.gle/kkhmaCsC3vTiPMDt8Rule: ★ You must join the Telegram group: Telegram ★ You will get 10 Stake for 10 posts a week.★ You must write at least 10 messages a week about the project.★ You are not allowed to write a message about the bounty campaign in the chat.★ Words "Hi, Hello, Bye, Farewell, etc." are not counted.★ Participants are forbidden to use any hashtags in telegram!★ You should not have the name of another project in the name of profile.★ Once a week, you must send a report to the form.★ Fill the registration form : https://forms.gle/fjg6KPxQ8ANVbEky9Reward100-1000 Karma 1 stakes per week1001-2500 Karma 2 stakes per week2501-5500 Karma 3 stakes per week5501-10,000 Karma 4 stakes per week10,000+ Karma 5 stakes per weekRules★ Have at least 300 Karma to participate.★ Make 2 custom posts per day about EPNOC. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.★ Minimum of 10 posts per week (10 custom posts).★ Use these hashtags; Use these hashtag : #EPNOC #ICO #PRESALE #BITCOIN #ETH #NFT #INVESTING #1000XGEM #CRPTOEXCHANGE #WEB3 #CRYPTONEWS #BLOCKCHAIN #HYBRID #GIVEAWAY★ Fill the registration form : https://forms.gle/1dfQFD9LQorBH4ZPARules:★ Every participant must join  Discord Channel.★ Participants have to interact with each other on EPNOC Discord channel.★ Participants have to write 5 constructive messages with each other per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).★ Time gap between 2 messages needs to be 10 hours minimum.★ Meaningless,irrelevant messages or copy and pasting messages by changing the project name are not counted, tryto help other users by providing the correct information regarding the project. Either youcan ask questions or help others with proper answers regarding the project.★ Please take the screenshot of your message and upload it on Imgur or similar websites.Then submit that link during report submission.★ Fill the registration form : https://forms.gle/YDqqM1WrSTQHF4iR7RewardsBest Video: 4 SteakGood video: 3 stackMedium video: 2 SteakLess video: 1 stack Rule:★ You must join the telegram group:★ Video should be 2 minutes long.★ The videos must include links to the official website in the description.★ You must have Bitcoin username in Description.★ A minimum of 100 customers with a crypto YouTube channel or tick talk videos need to be published.★ The use of theft or other people's ingredients will be considered as an illegal deposit.★ One person needs to upload two videos.★ Participants must use #EPNOC #ICO #PRESALE #BITCOIN #ETH #NFT #INVESTING #1000XGEM #CRPTOEXCHANGE #WEB3 #CRYPTONEWS #BLOCKCHAIN #HYBRID #GIVEAWAY Websit link,Telegram Link,Twitter Link,Whaitpaper Link etc.★ Fill the registration form : https://forms.gle/ngYhT2NLsxjYoTD4ARewards:  High quality: 3 stakesGood quality: 2 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules★ Article written has to be unique and all copy pasting of information from the website will be classified as invalid.★ Each participants is entitled to 2 article per week on different platforms like: Medium, Steemit, LinkedIn, Personal Blog like wordpress, blogspot, Web Domain etc. ★ Use these hashtags; Use these hashtag : #EPNOC #ICO #PRESALE #BITCOIN #ETH #NFT #INVESTING #1000XGEM #CRPTOEXCHANGE #WEB3 #CRYPTONEWS #BLOCKCHAIN #HYBRID #GIVEAWAY★ Fill the registration form : https://forms.gle/6EMLdWWWuVVnMq8S7_______________________________________________________________________________ _______________________________________________Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign.I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else.THIS BOUNTY CAMPAIGN DO NOT HAVE AN OFFICIAL ESCROW TO ITS BOUNTY POOL. Join (on this bounty campaign), invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO), or use their platform at your own risk.
